translations: adj．更易刺痛的；更多刺的：具有更多尖刺或刺痛性质的。
· The pricklier plant is harder to handle.
更多刺的植物更难处理。

sentences.sentence: But Li has maintained a pricklier relationship with some of her etiquette-challenged Chinese fans.
sentences.translation: 然而，李娜和国内一些不注重礼节的球迷关系并不愉快。

sentences.sentence: But relations with America will be pricklier than expected, partly because his pretensions to big-power status irk Washington.
sentences.translation: 但与美国的关系将会比预期的有更多磕绊，部分归因于他自命不凡的大国姿态让华盛顿很不爽。
